name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Shopping Scraper - Data Extractor & Exporter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Listings, Product, and Reviews from Google Shopping, with options to export in formats such as CSV, Excel, JSON, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Shopping Data Extractor & Downloader - Export Product Data to multiple formats.

Overview:
This powerful Google Shopping data extraction tool enables you to automatically download and convert product listings, search results, and reviews into multiple formats including CSV, Excel, and JSON. Our scraper extracts detailed information from both US and international Google Shopping pages, making it the perfect tool for market researchers, data analysts, and eCommerce businesses.

Key Features:
✓ Extract data from search results, product listings, and product detail pages
✓ Export to multiple formats
✓ Automatic pagination and data collection
✓ Support for both US and international Google Shopping versions
✓ Unlimited data extraction for Premium users

What Data You Can Extract:
• Product Listings
- Product name and description
- Pricing information
- Product ratings and reviews
- Product specifications
• Search Results
- Price comparisons
- Available sellers
• Product Reviews
- Rating scores
- Review text
- Reviewer information
- Review dates

Perfect For:
Market Research: Track competitor pricing and product trends
Competitive Intelligence: Monitor market positioning and product offerings
eCommerce Operations: Gather pricing data for competitive analysis
Marketing Agencies: Collect market data for client strategies

Export Format Support:
• CSV - Perfect for spreadsheet analysis
• Excel (XLSX) - Formatted with proper data types
• JSON - Ideal for developers
• HTML Table - Easy to read and analyze
• XML - Structured data export
• TXT - Plain text format
• Raw JSON - Complete data access

Supported Countries/Sites:
• US Google Shopping (new version)
• International Google Shopping (old version) - Available worldwide

Known Limitations:
• Rate limits apply for non-Premium users
• Requires Chrome or Chrome-based browsers

Technical Support:
Need assistance? Contact us: hello@nifty.codes

Privacy & Security:
Your login credentials are required to use this extension but are kept strictly confidential and never disclosed to third parties.
Exported data is formatted on our servers and never stored.
